SEARCH
Package main

Class Database

java.lang.Object
main.Database
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class Database extends Object implements Serializable
The Database class serves as a singleton to manage and store various user-related data and system-related information. It stores users, courses, news, messages, and other essential data for the system.
See Also:

    • getAverageRating

      public double getAverageRating(Teacher teacher)
      Retrieves the average rating for a given Teacher based on collected ratings.
      Parameters:
      teacher - The Teacher for whom the average rating is to be calculated
      Returns:
      The average rating for the Teacher; 0.0 if no ratings are available

      public Map<String,OrderStatus> getTasks()

      The tasks stored in the database
